description: Lists the versions of a particular DataBrew recipe, except for LATEST_WORKING.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the recipe for which to return version information.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that you can use in a subsequent call to retrieve the next set of results.

nested_items.name: Recipes
nested_items.description: A list of versions for the specified recipe.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who created the recipe.

nested_items.name: CreateDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the recipe was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who last modified the recipe.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The last modification date and time of the recipe.

nested_items.name: ProjectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project that the recipe is associated with.

nested_items.name: PublishedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who published the recipe.

nested_items.name: PublishedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the recipe was published.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the recipe.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The unique name for the recipe.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the recipe.

nested_items.name: Steps
nested_items.description: A list of steps that are defined by the recipe.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: The name of a valid DataBrew transformation to be performed on the data.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: Contextual parameters for the transformation.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConditionExpressions
nested_items.description: One or more conditions that must be met for the recipe step to succeed.

nested_items.name: Condition
nested_items.description: A specific condition to apply to a recipe action. For more information, see Recipe structure in the Glue DataBrew Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value that the condition must evaluate to for the condition to succeed.

nested_items.name: TargetColumn
nested_items.description: A column to apply this condition to.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RecipeVersion
nested_items.description: The identifier for the version for the recipe. Must be one of the following:

Numeric version ( X.Y) - X and Y stand for major and minor version numbers. The maximum length of each is 6 digits, and neither can be negative values. Both X and Y are required, and '0.0' isn't a valid version.
LATEST_WORKING - the most recent valid version being developed in a DataBrew project.
LATEST_PUBLISHED - the most recent published version.
